name: One page Wilderness Adventure
description:
A simple tabletop RPG adventure that can be run in any system.

An adventure that uses flowchart location design. Opponents faced in combat are simplified and based on the rules found in the One page monster cheat sheet.

Made for low-level characters for groups of up to 7 players.

Comes with 3 distinct player objectives that permeate the location.

Uses a time management system and universal encounter table to put pressure on player characters to drive the events of the story forwards.

Made of one-shots or a short 2-3 session story. Could be placed in the middle of an ongoing game. Can be used as a template for future location-based adventures.
